name: [meltpot]
description:
[meltpot] is a cryptocurrency investment DAO that helps allow the masses to take part in the most critical growth of the blockchain ecosystem while building its own community

The diversified portfolio is formed by a macroeconomic and profit-maximalist lens leveraging strategic opportunity cost and analysis to generate stronger returns, focused on the areas of blockchain infrastructure, gaming, NFTs, etc. In other words, this is investing in the internet in 1995 with ease

[Come Play, Together]
